# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an instance of [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/BalancedNavigationSplitViewStyle].

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency init()
```

## Discussion

You can also use [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/NavigationSplitViewStyle/balanced] to construct this style.
